channel.title: Run problem (on server not running the server)
channel.description:
my run(on server not running the server) is messed up, the only way to use run was were your standing click run and then click were your going, u run but wen u reach your distension run goes off by it's self, and u can only click once if u click after your running you will stop running.
is there any way to make it were u can have run stay on even after u stop?
